name: Skins Skunk
description: This 60% indica-dominant hybrid from Loud Seeds is a result of years of work that started by pollinating an elite clone-only Afgoo found in Sonoma with a male Michigan Skunk. Selected and bred to the f4 generation, Skins Skunk produces generous yields of hashy smelling flowers with THC levels ranging from 17% to 21% and CBD levels up to 2%.
descriptionPlain: This 60% indica-dominant hybrid from Loud Seeds is a result of years of work that started by pollinating an elite clone-only Afgoo found in Sonoma with a male Michigan Skunk. Selected and bred to the f4 generation, Skins Skunk produces generous yields of hashy smelling flowers with THC levels ranging from 17% to 21% and CBD levels up to 2%.

highlightedReviews.text: Super strain , I like the yields that produce for hash is definitely high quality plant to grow ... LoudSeeds makes great genetics !

This. Is. Delightful. Its pretty strong too, highly recommend for pain, anxiety and insomnia. After a small dab my whole body is pretty relaxed, eyes heavy. It's definitely working on my overall chronic pain as well as the muscle cramps and spasms I have from overdoing it yesterday and not sleeping last night. My pain level was at an 8 prior, now it's down to about a 4-5, which is sinifcant for me. I'm feeling very content, in a pleasant resting mood about to put on some Netflix and just relax üòú Taste is good too, kinda sweet -
a little like strawberry lemonade. I feel ready for a nap now, thank the lord! This is certainly going to help me sleep tonight. Woo-hoo! üòÅ Love this ‚ô°

1 drawback - I have a headache, but don't know if it's strain related or stress related. 

But GO GET YOU SOME!! lol

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Tigermelon, Mt. Hood Magic, Kid N' Cookies, Logic Diesel, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
It's time to start stocking up for 4/20! Did you know you can search strains on Leafly by effects, flavors, benefits, and more? Use the advanced search filters at the top of our strain Explorer to "customize" your 4/20 experience! Or, allow us to recommend the following seven strains that were just added to our database. Who knows, maybe they're just what you're looking for.
¬†
¬†¬†1. Kid N' Cookies

A cross of GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) (Forum cut) and Snowman OG, Kid n‚Äô Cookies is a collaboration between Fresno, CA breeders Loud Seeds, and Christopher ‚ÄúKid‚Äù Reid, better known as one half of the famous ‚Äò90s rap duo ‚ÄúKid n‚Äô Play.‚Äù As a potent indica-dominant hybrid testing at over 22% THC, Kid n‚Äô Cookies has a heavy, sedating high that can provide relief from pain, nausea, migraines, and insomnia. The flavor is much like the ‚Äúcookie‚Äù taste of GSC with undertones of pine.

¬†
¬†¬†2. Tigermelon

Tigermelon is a mysterious strain of unknown origin that has been used by the breeder Bodhi Seeds to create some spectacular hybrids such as Snow Leopard. It is thought to be a three-way cross of Chemdawg, Apollo 11 (Genius cut) and an Uzbekistani indica, and the smell has been described by Bodhi as ‚Äúsandalwood mango lassi.‚Äù

¬†
¬†¬†3. Logic Diesel

Created by GroundSwell Cannabis Boutique in Denver, CO at the request of world-renowned electronic/acid jazz musician DJ Logic, Logic Diesel is a cross between Mystic Kush and NYC Diesel. It has a sweet and sour, skunky diesel odor and flavors ranging from sweet sandalwood to spicy fuel. Logic Diesel will provide an intense, exciting sense of euphoria along with a mildly relaxing body high that is perfect for hitting the dance floor.

¬†
¬†¬†4. Haze Berry

A cross between Super Silver Haze and DJ Short‚Äôs famous Blueberry, Haze Berry is an 80% sativa hybrid that has become quite popular for its combination of sweet berry, indica-like flavors, and sativa highs. As you might expect from a plant with two extremely potent parents, Haze Berry routinely tests at well over 20% THC, and some cultivars have a significant amount of CBD as well. In addition, it provides higher than average yields and a relatively short flowering time of 9-10 weeks, making this a very attractive strain for sativa enthusiasts. Haze Berry gives the consumer a euphoric, creativity-inducing high that gradually gives way to a profound sensation of relaxation and well-being.

¬†
¬†¬†5. Mt. Hood Magic

Thought to be exclusive to Portland, Oregon dispensary Five Zero Trees, Mt. Hood Magic is a cross between Northern Lights #5 and Durban Poison. There a few different phenotypes available: two are indica-dominant and more resemble the NL5 portion of its genetics, testing at 17% and 14% THC; and one is sativa-dominant and similar to Durban Poison, testing at 19% THC.

¬†
¬†¬†6. Citrus Sap

From Crockett Family Farms and DNA Genetics, Citrus Sap is a hybrid cross between GG4 (f.k.a Gorilla Glue #4) and Tangie. Growers can expect high yields, heavy resin production, and a sweet mandarin orange aroma, as well as a high calyx-to-leaf ratio. Its flowering time averages between 65 to 70 days.

¬†
¬†¬†7. Skins Skunk

This 60% indica-dominant hybrid from Loud Seeds is a result of years of work that started by pollinating an elite clone-only Afgoo found in Sonoma with a male Michigan Skunk. Selected and bred to the f4 generation, Skins Skunk produces generous yields of hashy smelling flowers with THC levels ranging from 17% to 21% and CBD levels up to 2%.

¬†
Browse through our other new strains that were recently added to the Leafly Explorer, or check out last week's newest additions!
